entry.title: Sunday night: Rain mixed with snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Rain mixed with snow ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy late in the evening with 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the evening and after midnight then 60 percent chance of flurries overnight.
